ElIf and Else Examples
######################

Coded variants
==============

.. if:: l1 == 1

   Coded variants.1.1 shall not be in the output.

.. elif:: l1 == 2

   Coded variants.1.2 shall not be in the output.

.. elif:: l1 == 3

   Coded variants.1.3 shall be in the output.

.. else::

   Coded variants.1.4 shall not be in the output.

.. if:: l2 == 1

   Coded variants.2.1 shall not be in the output.

.. elif:: l2 == 2

   Coded variants.2.2 shall not be in the output.

.. if:: l2 == 3

   Coded variants.2.3 shall be in the output.

.. else::

   Coded variants.2.4 shall not be in the output.
